_header: Today says John the good gospeller
Note: For other MSS see 5671; for the version in the ‘expanded’ Cycle see 5394.
_description: Gospel for Fourth Sunday in Advent, in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
TO day seiþ seint Ion þe gospellereIn vr gospel as
                    ȝe mowe here…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…I wol on telle of a pilgrymHow Sathanas bi gyled
                    him
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BLAdd38010.First Lines:
To day sais Iohn þe gospellerIn oure gospell als ȝe may
                    here…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines: …And halde vs in rightwisnesThat euen gate to warde heuen es

EDCPCM.First Lines:
tO day sais Ion þe god godspellereIn our god spel als ye mai
                    her…
EDCPCM.Last Lines:
…Þi vaiage may noht pai meBot ef þou do þat I
                    bid þe
EDCPCM.Attributed Title:
Dominica iiiia in aduentu domini secundum Johannem (f.
                        22va)

HunHM129.First Lines:
To day seyt seynt Ion þe gospellerIn oure gospell as ȝe
                    may here…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…I wyll ȝow tell of a pylgrymHow satanas be gylyt
                    hym
